verbose_text: In contrast to the effect of sodium on T H 17 cells and Tregs, our findings show that potassium not only enhances the induction of Foxp3 induced by TGF-beta1 but also reinforces Foxp3 expression in T H 17 cells suggesting a possible anti-inflammatory function of potassium via induction of Foxp3 mediated T cells tolerance.
evidence: potassium not only enhances the induction of Foxp3
